item.title: 亚洲股市溃败后寻求缓解性反弹
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市有望出现缓解性反弹，因为期货市场指出，遭受重创的日经指数开盘后将出现反弹，而且央行官员也会发表各种正确的言论来安抚市场神经。【原文：Asian share markets were hoping for a relief rally on Tuesday as futures pointed to an opening bounce on the hard-hit Nikkei and central bank officials said all the right things to soothe market nerves.】

item.title: 对中东供应的担忧加剧，油价上涨超过 1 美元
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价上涨，扭转了上一交易日的跌势，原因是对中东冲突升级可能打击供应的担忧超过了对美国经济衰退可能损害世界头号石油消费国需求的担忧。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trade on Tuesday, reversing the previous session's loss as concerns that an escalating Middle East conflict could hit supplies outweighed fears of a possible U.S. recession that could hurt demand in the world's top oil consumer.】

item.title: 美国法官讲述谷歌如何建立并维护非法搜索垄断地位
item.description: 美国地区法官阿米特-梅塔（Amit Mehta）周一裁定，谷歌斥资数十亿美元与开发商、运营商和设备制造商达成独家协议，成为默认搜索引擎，违反了反垄断法。【原文：U.S. District Judge Amit Mehta on Monday ruled that Google had violated antitrust law by spending billions of dollars to secure exclusive agreements with developers, carriers and equipment makers to be the default search engine.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购降至三年多来最低点
item.description: 纽约联储称，周一接受了向其隔夜逆回购机制提交的 3162.46 亿美元，为 2021 年 5 月以来最低。【原文：The New York Federal Reserve said it accepted $316.246 billion submitted to its overnight reverse repo facility on Monday, the lowest since May 2021.】

item.title: 部长表示，加拿大卡车司机协会与铁路公司同意重启合同谈判
item.description: 加拿大劳工部长史蒂文-麦金农（Steven MacKinnon）周一表示，加拿大卡车司机协会、加拿大国家铁路公司和堪萨斯城加拿大太平洋公司已同意与联邦调解员一起重启陷入僵局的合同谈判。【原文：Teamsters Canada, Canadian National Railway and Canadian Pacific Kansas City have agreed to restart stalled contract negotiations along with federal mediators, Minister of Labor Steven MacKinnon said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储戴利：对通胀率达到 2% 更有信心
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周一表示，她 "更有信心 "美国通胀率朝着美联储2%的目标迈进。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Monday said she is "more confident" U.S. inflation is headed toward the Fed's 2% goal.】

item.title: 西蒙地产集团下调年度净利润预期，第二季度财务和财务报告不及预期
item.description: 西蒙地产集团（Simon Property Group）周一下调了年度净利润预期，第二季度运营资金（FFO）也未达预期。【原文：Simon Property Group lowered annual forecast for net income and missed second-quarter estimates for funds from operations (FFO) on Monday.】

item.title: 埃利奥特在新的监管文件中细分了西南航空的所有权
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周一在一份监管文件中表示，该公司持有西南航空公司 7% 的实益所有权，并详细说明了该公司在努力整顿管理层和改善财务业绩的过程中所拥有的股权。【原文：Elliott Investment Management on Monday said in a regulatory filing that it has a 7% beneficial ownership in Southwest Airlines , giving a breakdown of what it owns as it tries to overhaul management and improve financial performance.】

item.title: 早间投标盘点日本历史性的市场崩溃
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 因大规模故障导致航空旅行中断而被乘客起诉
item.description: 周一，CrowdStrike 因上月全球大规模计算机故障而陷入的法律纠纷进一步加深，这家网络安全公司被航班延误或取消的旅客告上法庭。【原文：CrowdStrike's legal troubles from last month's massive global computer outage deepened on Monday, as the cybersecurity company was sued by air travelers whose flights were delayed or canceled.】

item.title: 贝莱德经理称，美债涨势过度，但美联储本应在 7 月降息
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）的一位投资组合经理表示，近期美国国债在大幅降息预期的推动下出现反弹，但这种反弹是过度的，因为经济的韧性可能使央行没有必要像市场押注的那样大幅降低借贷成本。【原文：A recent U.S. Treasuries rally, fueled by expectations of significantly lower interest rates, is overdone as the economy's resilience may make it unnecessary for the central bank to lower borrowing costs by as much as the market bets, a BlackRock portfolio manager said.】

item.title: CSX 第二季度利润超预期，原因是销量增加、定价强劲
item.description: 美国铁路运营商 CSX 周一的第二季度利润略高于预期，主要得益于较高的运输量和强劲的定价，盘后股价上涨了 5%。【原文：U.S. railroad operator CSX narrowly beat second-quarter profit estimates on Monday, helped by higher shipment volumes and robust pricing, sending its shares up 5% after the bell.】

item.title: 百胜中国首席财务官辞职
item.description: 百胜中国控股公司（Yum China Holdings）表示，财务总监杨国强（Andy Yeung）拟因个人原因辞职，辞职于 9 月 30 日生效。【原文：Yum China Holdings said finance chief Andy Yeung intends to resign for personal reasons, effective Sept. 30.】

item.title: 诺华和 Viatris 因 "HeLa "细胞滥用索赔面临新诉讼
item.description: 诺华公司和 Viatris 公司周一在马里兰州遭到一名妇女家属的联邦诉讼，这名妇女的组织细胞在 20 世纪 50 年代被从其体内提取并用于医学研究和开发。【原文：Novartis and Viatris were hit with a federal lawsuit in Maryland on Monday by the family of a woman whose tissue cells were taken from her body in the 1950s and used to fuel medical research and development.】

item.title: 美债收益率下降表明抵押贷款利率可能会降低
item.description: 过去几天的金融市场动荡可能很快会给数百万美国家庭带来一线希望：抵押贷款利率似乎将进一步下降，为那些急于在昂贵的房地产市场上站稳脚跟的人提供了机会，也为其他以高利率借贷的人提供了再融资的机会。【原文：The financial market upheaval of the last several days may soon offer a silver lining to millions of U.S. households: Mortgage rates look set to fall further, offering an opening for those eager to get a toehold in an expensive housing market and an opportunity for others who borrowed at high rates to refinance.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利披露美国证券交易委员会要求提供的咨询账户现金余额信息
item.description: 摩根士丹利周一表示，该公司正在回应美国证券监管机构执法部门提出的有关将顾问账户现金余额转入关联银行存款计划的要求。【原文：Morgan Stanley said on Monday the firm is responding to requests from the enforcement division of the U.S. securities regulator regarding advisory account cash balances swept to affiliate bank deposit programs.】

item.title: 美联储为美国大型银行发布 "生前遗嘱 "指南
item.description: 美联储周一发布了针对美国大型银行的新指南，详细说明了这些银行应如何制定 "生前遗嘱"，详细说明如何安全地解散银行。【原文：The Federal Reserve issued new guidance on Monday for larger U.S. banks detailing how they should develop "living wills" detailing how they can be safely dissolved.】

item.title: 分析师称英伟达人工智能芯片需求受潜在生产延迟影响有限
item.description: 分析师说，对 Nvidia 即将推出的人工智能芯片推迟上市的担忧可能被夸大了，因为他们预计这一挫折不会对芯片巨头的收入或需求产生大的影响。【原文：Worries over a delay in the launch of Nvidia's upcoming artificial-intelligence chips may be exaggerated, analysts said, as they do not expect the setback to have a big impact on the chip giant's revenue or demand.】

item.title: 精神航空烧掉更多现金，737 产量下降
item.description: 精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）周一报告称，由于其最大客户波音公司的 737 机身出货量下降，该公司最畅销的窄体喷气式飞机的生产速度也在下降，因此季度现金消耗增加。【原文：Spirit AeroSystems on Monday reported a higher quarterly cash burn on lower 737 fuselage shipments to its biggest customer Boeing , which is producing its best-selling narrowbody jets at a lower rate.】

item.title: 美国掉期利差收窄，显示压力增大
item.description: 周一，美国利率掉期与国债的利差收窄或变得更加负面，因为长期投资者在掉期市场对冲风险，为利率下降做准备，这表明了对股市大幅抛售的担忧。【原文：Spreads on U.S. interest rate swaps over Treasuries tightened or turned more negative on Monday as long-term investors hedged their exposure in the swaps market to position for lower interest rates in a sign of concern over the sharp sell-off in stocks.】

item.title: Lucid 获沙特股东注资 15 亿美元，营收超出预期
item.description: Lucid 集团周一表示，其最大股东沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金将注资 15 亿美元现金，因为这家电动汽车制造商希望为其产品线增加新车型。【原文：Lucid Group said on Monday its largest shareholder, Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund, will inject $1.5 billion in cash, as the electric vehicle maker looks to add new models to its product line.】

item.title: Palantir 凭借人工智能优势上调年度收入预期，股价大涨
item.description: 本周一，Palantir Technologies 公司今年第二次上调了年度收入预期，这是生成式人工智能热潮推动其软件服务需求的最新迹象。【原文：Palantir Technologies raised its annual revenue forecast for the second time this year on Monday, the latest sign that the generative AI boom is driving demand for its software services.】

item.title: TikTok 称法院应驳回美国司法部在资产剥离诉讼中秘密提交的文件
item.description: TikTok 和母公司 ByteDance 周一请求美国上诉法院驳回美国司法部秘密提交部分法律文件的请求，该文件旨在为一项法律辩护，该法律要求在 1 月 19 日前强制剥离 TikTok 的美国资产，否则将实施禁令。【原文：TikTok and parent company ByteDance asked a U.S. appeals court on Monday to reject the Justice Department's bid to file part of its legal case in secret that defends a law seeking to force the divestiture of TikTok's U.S. assets by Jan. 19 or impose a ban.】

item.title: 美国汽车安全机构称正寻求有关特斯拉 Cybertruck 致命车祸的信息
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周一表示，它正在向特斯拉电动汽车制造商寻求有关特斯拉 Cybertruck 事故的更多信息。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it was seeking more information about an accident involving Tesla's Cybertruck from the electric vehicle maker.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定谷歌在搜索案中违反反垄断法
item.description: 一名联邦法官周一裁定，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司为巩固其在网络搜索和相关广告领域的主导地位而触犯了法律，这是美国司法部 20 多年来在打击垄断方面取得的首次胜利。【原文：Alphabet's Google broke the law to cement its dominance over online searches and related ads, a federal judge ruled on Monday in the U.S. Justice Department's first victory against a monopoly in more than 20 years.】

item.title: 随着对经济增长的担忧骤增，2024 年获胜交易的回落打击了全球市场
item.description: 从规模庞大的美国科技股到比特币，一连串的经济忧虑正迫使今年最热门的交易平仓，让投资者不得不判断未来还有多少下跌空间。【原文：From massive U.S. tech stocks to bitcoin, a spasm of economic worries is forcing an unwind of the year’s most popular trades, leaving investors to determine how much more downside could lay ahead.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，第二季度美国银行对工商业贷款的需求并未减弱
item.description: 据美联储周一公布的一项对高级贷款官员的调查显示，最近一个季度美国银行对商业和工业贷款的需求没有变化，这是两年来该指标表现最强劲的一次。 上周，美联储官员在决定将政策利率维持在 5.25%-5.50% 的范围内，但表示可能会降息时，已经掌握了这一调查结果。【原文：U.S. banks reported no change in demand for commercial and industrial loans in the most recent quarter, the strongest showing on that measure in two years, according to a Federal Reserve survey of senior loan officers published on Monday. Fed officials had the survey results in hand last week when they decided to leave the policy rate in the 5.25%-5.50% range but to flag a possible interest-rate c】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，房利美和房地美将收紧房地产贷款规则
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）两家抵押贷款融资公司将对商业地产贷款机构和经纪人实施更严格的规定，此前监管部门已开始打击这一价值数万亿美元市场中的欺诈行为。【原文：Mortgage financing firms Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac are set to impose stricter rules for commercial property lenders and brokers, following a budding regulatory crackdown on fraud in the multi-trillion dollar market, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 接触孟加拉国主要供应商的全球服装公司
item.description: 孟加拉国当前的政治动荡预计将扰乱该国的服装业，可能影响到从 H&M 到 Zara 等全球服装零售商进入关键的假日销售旺季。【原文：The current political unrest in Bangladesh is expected to disrupt the country's clothing industry, potentially affecting global apparel retailers from H&M to Zara as they head into the key holiday season.】

item.title: 波音和 Spirit AeroSystems 高层将在 NTSB 听证会上就 MAX 9 紧急事件作证
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会表示，波音公司和 Spirit AeroSystems 公司的多位高管将在周二开始的为期两天的听证会上就阿拉斯加航空公司波音 737 MAX 9 型客机一月份发生的机舱门堵塞紧急事件作证。【原文：The National Transportation Safety Board said a number of Boeing and Spirit AeroSystems executives will testify at a two-day hearing starting Tuesday on the January Alaska Airlines Boeing 737 MAX 9 in-flight door plug emergency.】
